column2: "OK, so, first of all... I want to go to the Volcanic Caves to make sure the Valentine's Day venue is safe!"
"The thing is, there's still some blank spots in my memory, so I'm a bit nervous... I hate to ask, but could you go with me?"
"Here's my Partner Card! Thanks in advance!"
"Everyone's looking forward to Valentine's Day, so let's get going right away!"
